attributes.action: MAKE RANGE ROVER/LAND ROVER RECALL DETACHABLE TOW BARS AS A MATTER OF URGENCY
attributes.background: DETACHABLE TOW BARS ARE UNSAFE AND NEED TO BE RECALLED AND MADE SAFE WITH AN ALTERNATIVE FIXING

rejection.details:
We can't accept this petition because this isn't something that the UK Government and Parliament are responsible for. 

In any case, there was a recall of some vehicles. You can find out more here:

https://assets.publishing.service.gov.uk/government/uploads/system/uploads/attachment_data/file/403839/non-code-action-bulletin-5.pdf

You can find out how to report a serious defect that affects the safety of your vehicle, one of its parts, or an accessory, here:

https://www.gov.uk/vehicle-recalls-and-faults/report-a-serious-safety-defect
